subject: Basketball
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: As Ed Conroy flew to the Citadel 20 years ago as a basketball recruit, he regretted even bothering to visit the military school in Greenville, S.C., made infamous by his novelist cousin, Pat Conroy.
